data.title: Equipment Inventory
data.statement:
Keep track of equipment for your adventuring party!

Adventurers say that they add equipment and remove equipment from the party treasure along with its value.  The program keeps track of what's in the inventory and the total value.  Items are always added to the end of the list.  If two or more items have the same name then a remove statement will remove all items items that match

testCases.title: Test 3
testCases.testIn:
4
ADD pants 25
ADD shirt 99
REMOVE pants
INVENTORY

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
4
ADD helmet 50
ADD gloves 66
REMOVE helmet
INVENTORY

testCases.title: Test 4
testCases.testIn:
8
ADD pants 25
INVENTORY
ADD shirt 99
INVENTORY
REMOVE pants
INVENTORY
ADD pants 24
INVENTORY
testCases.testOut:
INVENTORY pants TOTALS 25 GOLD
INVENTORY pants, shirt TOTALS 124 GOLD
INVENTORY shirt TOTALS 99 GOLD
INVENTORY shirt, pants TOTALS 123 GOLD

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
8
ADD pants 11
INVENTORY
ADD shirt 66
INVENTORY
REMOVE pants
INVENTORY
ADD pants 22
INVENTORY
testCases.testOut:
INVENTORY pants TOTALS 11 GOLD
INVENTORY pants, shirt TOTALS 77 GOLD
INVENTORY shirt TOTALS 66 GOLD
INVENTORY shirt, pants TOTALS 88 GOLD

testCases.title: Test 5
testCases.testIn:
6
ADD boots 12
ADD cloak 105
ADD sword 500
REMOVE cloak
INVENTORY
ADD hat 31

testCases.title: Validator 5
testCases.testIn:
6
ADD pants 32
ADD shirt 25
ADD belt 6
REMOVE shirt
INVENTORY
ADD shirt 26

data.constraints:
[[linecount]] < 50
The amount is always positive and is less than or equal to 1000 each
INVENTORY will only be called when there is at least 1 item in the inventory.
REMOVE will only be called with an item that is in the inventory.
data.stubGenerator:
read LINECOUNT:int
loop LINECOUNT read COMMAND:string(100)
write INVENTORY helmet TOTALS 50 GOLD
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[linecount]] of the number of lines of input to read

Each line of input can be one of the following
ADD [equipment name] [amount]
REMOVE [equipment name]
INVENTORY
data.outputDescription:
For every INVENTORY request output 1 line
INVENTORY [comma and space separated list of equipment names] TOTALS [total amount] GOLD

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Keep track of equipment for your adventuring party!

Adventurers say that they add equipment and remove equipment from the party treasure along with its value. The program keeps track of what's in the inventory and the total value. Items are always added to the end of the list. If two or more items have the same name then a remove statement will remove all items items that match
Input
Line 1: An integer linecount of the number of lines of input to read

Each line of input can be one of the following
ADD [equipment name] [amount]
REMOVE [equipment name]
INVENTORY
Output
For every INVENTORY request output 1 line
INVENTORY [comma and space separated list of equipment names] TOTALS [total amount] GOLD
Constraints
linecount < 50
The amount is always positive and is less than or equal to 1000 each
INVENTORY will only be called when there is at least 1 item in the inventory.
REMOVE will only be called with an item that is in the inventory.
Example
Input
2
ADD helmet 50
INVENTORY
Output
INVENTORY helmet TOTALS 50 GOLD
